text: Matthew Nathan Drudge (born October 27, 1966) is an American political commentator, the creator and editor of the Drudge Report. ==References== ==Other websites== * Transcript, audio, video of Matt Drudge's National Press Club speech * * * Matt Drudge on Facebook Category:American journalists Category:American Internet celebrities Category:American political commentators Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American political writers Category:American political activists Category:Writers from Maryland Category:People from Takoma Park, Maryland
title: Matt Drudge
